.. class:: UserRender

   .. attribute:: kind
      :annotation: = json.vi

      

   .. method:: loginSucceeded(self, **kwargs)

      This loginSuccess method generates a HTML site, which redirects by meta-refresh to the Vi,
      but can also be easily read by Ajax requests.
